meta.job_title: Asset Protection / Loss Prevention (LP) Investigator / Associate

duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor shortage results, shortage control, price changes, return to vendor transactions, and receipt reconciliation.
Conduct investigations and apprehensions regarding internal and external theft.
Implement store safety programs at an individual Saks Fifth Avenue location.
Train store associates on awareness and Asset Protection policies and procedures.
Maintain the integrity of physical inventory by monitoring reports and audits on a daily and monthly basis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree preferred, Wicklander-Zulawski certification a plus
